text: Ani pavitra mahinaharu bitisakepachi, musrikaharula'i jahamsukai phela pare marihala, uniharula'i samata ra uniharula'i gherama li'ihala ra unako lagi pratyeka ghatima basirakha. Tara yadi tiniharu prayascita garchan ra namaja kayama garchan ra ja√ûkata dinchan bhane uniharuko bato chadide'u. Niscaya nai allaha bado ksamasila, dayavan cha
